Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController

Class ScoreboardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController.ScoreboardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
StationListener, Listener, UI
public class ScoreboardController extends GUIController implements StationListener
The class represent a controller for the Scoreboard element in the GUI. The class controls the display and updating of pawns on the scoreboard based on the player scores.

  • Field Details

    • scoreboardPositions

      private static final double[][] scoreboardPositions
      The array contains the positions in pixels from the top left corner of each point in the scoreboard. Those positions are absolute (so they are calculated considering the full size of the scoreboard image) and therefore they will be modified in each resize.

    • bluePawnImage

      private final javafx.scene.image.Image bluePawnImage
      The Image contains the image of the blue pawn.

    • redPawnImage

      private final javafx.scene.image.Image redPawnImage
      The Image contains the image of the red pawn.

    • greenPawnImage

      private final javafx.scene.image.Image greenPawnImage
      The Image contains the image of the green pawn.

    • yellowPawnImage

      private final javafx.scene.image.Image yellowPawnImage
      The Image contains the image of the yellow pawn.

    • pawnScoreboard

      private final HashMap<String,javafx.scene.image.ImageView> pawnScoreboard
      A hashmap that connects each color, represented as a lowercase string, to its ImageView. This is used when updating the position of the pawns on the scoreboard.

    • pawnPositions

      private final HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.ImageView>> pawnPositions
      A hashmap that connects each point in the scoreboard (numbers between 0 and 29) to an array that contains the ImageView of the pawn in that positions.

    • scoreboardImage

      private javafx.scene.image.Image scoreboardImage
      The scoreboard image

    • scoreboardView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView scoreboardView
      An ImageView with the scoreboard image

    • scoreboardPane

      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane scoreboardPane
      The pane that represents the scoreboard

    • pawnSize

      private double pawnSize
      A double that represents the dimensions of the image representing the pawns.

    • proportions

      private double proportions
      The proportions of the scoreboard.

    • ratio

      private double ratio
      The dimensions of the scoreboard compared to its original dimensions.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScoreboardController

      public ScoreboardController(GUIController controller)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      To initialize the ScoreboardControlled by creating the images, controlling the local model if there are stations and pawn and placing them accordingly. Listeners to update all pawns positions and size are added.

    • getScoreboardPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getScoreboardPane()
      Getter for scoreboardPane
      Returns:
      the scoreboardPane

    • updateAllPawns

      public void updateAllPawns()
      Method used to update all pawns including their size and position of the board.

    • placePawn

      public void placePawn(LocalStationPlayer station)
      Method used to place the pawn of a related station given the station from which take the color and the score.
      Parameters:
      station - the station from which to take the points and the color of the pawn.

    • updatePositions

      private void updatePositions(int numPoints)
      If there is more than one pawn in a position on the scoreboard those should be moved so that more than one pawn can be seen in that position. An offset is used so that the pawns are always moved in the same way.
      Parameters:
      numPoints - the point position in the scoreboard that needs an update.

    • notify

      public void notify(PersonalStation localStationPlayer)
      This method is used to notify the ScoreboardController about PersonalStation events. The method updates the position of the pawn of that station using the passed value.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface StationListener
      Parameters:
      localStationPlayer - is the PersonalStation that has changed

    • notify

      public void notify(OtherStation otherStation)
      This method is used to notify the ScoreboardController about OtherStation events. The method updates the position of the pawn of that station using the passed value.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface StationListener
      Parameters:
      otherStation - is the OtherStation that has changed

    • notifyErrorStation

      public void notifyErrorStation(String... varArgs)
      This method is not implemented as those kind of errors be handled in another part of the GUI view.
      Specified by:
      notifyErrorStation in interface StationListener
      Parameters:
      varArgs - strings describing the error

    • addMouseHoverListener

      private void addMouseHoverListener(javafx.scene.image.ImageView pawnImageView)
      The method implements a listener to the location of the mouse so that if a mouse is over a pawn, that pawn is brought behind the scoreboard. This is useful if a user wants to see the points of a player but the pawn is hiding the points number in the scoreboard.
      Parameters:
      pawnImageView - the ImageView that we want to be hidden when a mouse is above that.
